ygData.subject: Re: I dont know why u play a wizard, but...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have allways grouped since level 10..why? because you can take on higher Baddies with a group than you can as soloa dn have less Down time AND that leads to
ygData.messageBody:
I have allways grouped since level 10..why? because you can take on higher
Baddies with a group than you can as soloa dn have less Down time AND that
leads to Quantity slaying of Bad things..I went to Cazic Thule grouped with
some people 3 levels above me(I was 19..just turned) and got a level in 8
hours..and they were amazed by the help a wizard could be..(they were 4
fighters and a cleric) we didnt have to run but one time when someone was
SOW'd and pulled a train of about 12 Lizardmen ranging from a Judi to
Guard..that was nasty...

Point being Grouping is good in Higer level Dungons..It has been very
successful for me so far

Auraelle Dracul
Lords of Light
E'ci
----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Bratina <gbratina@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 3:57 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] I dont know why u play a wizard, but...


> From: "Tom Bratina" <gbratina@...>
>
> couldn't have said it better.
>
> my lvl 24 analysis:
> probably win blues (lvl 18-19): if i don't kill it, i screwed up. usually
> have 50% mana left.
> risky blues (lvl 20-21): kill about 70% of the time, run about 30% of the
> time. if successful, usually have about 10% to 20% mana left (the 30% i
run
> is due to fizzles/resists or just plain stupidity).
> dangerous blues (lvl 22-23): don't mess with solo unless near zone...
great
> exp if successful. long downtime though. usually run out of mana.
>
> note: above is solo'ing numbers. since hitting lvl 25, i havent solo'ed.
>
> any of you othe lvl 25+ wizzies out there know if we're gonna get any
other
> blue con than "formidable" (every blue i've conned has been "formidable").
> i really liked the three tier blue cons we got from lvl 18-24.
>
> ps. haha, whites are now "gamble", and yellows are now "wipe the ground
with
> your face". slowly but surely, that group thingy is becoming more and
more
> important.
>
> Sinlaru Ce`alen
> Rallos Zek
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Marziani, Michael D. <Michael.Marziani@...>
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, June 10, 1999 9:20 AM
> Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] I dont know why u play a wizard, but...
>
>
> >From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
> >
> >At level 21, I was happily soloing blue aviak guards and even the
> occasional
> >blue conning dry bone skeleton in lake rathe. I might have had to run
> about
> >50% of the time from the skeletons unless there was someone there to give
> me
> >a hand when i got in too deep, but I only had to run about 5% of the time
> >from the aviaks. There are so many things to fight at this level it is
> >unreal. The people that complain how they can't solo should either 1)
find
> >a group or 2) explore a bit more.
> >
> >Personally I like to group. After soloing from level 22 to 24 I was
bored
> >out of my mind. In a group downtime seems so less significant because
you
> >have someone to chat with. Also grouping affords much greater safety
than
> >being alone.
> >
> >-Solric
> >
> >
